newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech BICS100 bond index falls 0.050pts to 102.379.
newsitem.headline: Czech BICS100 bond index falls 0.050pts to 102.379.

text.p: The BICS 100 index measuring the Czech Republic's most liquid bonds fell 0.050 points in Monday's trading to 102.379, bank Ceska Sporitelna said.
It said the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.009 points to 2.364 years.
The index can also be found on Reuters page .BICS.

The BICSG 100 index, which Ceska Sporitelna calculates using only government bonds, fell 0.080 points to 98.973 points, the bank said, and the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.009 points to 2.230 years.
It said the yield index YBICS 1000 rose 3.590 points to 1,074.085.
